pages.title: Fermentation
pages.text: Fermentation is a process that allows to make wines.There are several wines: oregon grape wine, ice purple wine, marula wine, rowan wines, cherry wine, lotus wine, num-num wine. You will need to pour the raw fruit mash(made in presser) into the clay vessel by right-click.Then leave a vessel for a while until the wine is ready.Right-click with a glass bottle to take out the wine.

Clay vessel also allows to make soy sauce from soy beans paste(made in presser) and sour cream from milk.Right-click with wooden bucket with olive paste or bucket with milk to start process.Right-click with a glass bottle to take out the soy sauce or with wooden bowl to take out the sour cream.
